author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lsb Industries - Commenced Cash Tender Offer To Buy Any And All Outstanding $375 Mln 8.50% Senior Secured Notes
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - LSB Industries Inc:
* LSB INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES CASH TENDER OFFER FOR ITS OUTSTANDING 8.50% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2019
* LSB INDUSTRIES - COMMENCED CASH TENDER OFFER TO BUY ANY AND ALL OUTSTANDING $375 MILLION 8.50% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2019
* LSB INDUSTRIES INC - TENDER OFFER SCHEDULED TO EXPIRE ON APRIL 20, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
